l":{"keccak256":"0x13008b86d9661a1b9405c14893d852ac7dfb109909386e6738154825f00bf511","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://aeac22d6cf7ec4417ddce6299567d071f5e7a4ecc5685b65053afe61a6ee6ec4","dweb:/ipfs/QmTa95Mycqzo6HPerbCq4i7fVXAk4ZborWmkRSPigRAZeR"]},"src/indai.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb818ba4feba24617966f3d81b5089d4d35ad513fb05e3e65b87bb00f377c3357","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fc8423b944efda0d68c6458078595cc01e6374ac5e6c1fddbe397d874979b941","dweb:/ipfs/QmSorBbfoEXzXMDufSJUWjknubNMfieVPNLibGSajWDH1F"]},"src/libraries/OracleLib.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5beaeb5662cd8bce404b447166ef4c993089f91261509f80e23ae2bb70d6a9e4","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://09f7a93349f414694419c2b158f8916a344a4ebca694505b12718e7fc398a62f","dweb:/ipfs/QmTFbnrPA5V2QJMrYsf4DjagqDEBg5WFT3cA1RpA7ogq2G"]}},"version":1}

returns.upkeepNeeded: Bool indicating if upkeep is needed, based on specific conditions.

params._BASE_RISK_RATE: Base rate debt on a vault.
params._CIP: Initial collateral to Indai token percentage (threshold).
params._RISK_PREMIUM_RATE: Currently only for ethereum, the rate associated with debt in a vault, with increasing time.

createOrUpdateVault().details: Msg.value must be in native decimals, in this case 1e18.

params.amountINR: Amount of INR to be converted to ETH, in native decimals in this case 1e8.

returns._0: uint256 Amount of ETH converted to INR, in native decimals in this case 1e18.
uint256 Base Risk Rate on all collateral types defined by the DAO.
uint256 Collateral to indai percentage threshold defined by the DAO.

getCurrentVaultId().details: Can be used to get total number of vaults in the system.Vault Id starts from 1.

returns._0: uint256 Current global counter of vault ids.
uint256 Maximum amount of indai that can be minted by a user at current state in no decimals.
uint256 Max amount of collateral that can be withdrawn by a user at current state in native decimals, in this case 1e18.
uint256 Risk Premium Rate on specific collateral type defined by the DAO.
int256 Total collateral balance of the whole contract in ETH in native decimals, in this case 1e18
vault[] Total database of vaults in array of structs userVaults.
uint256 User's current collateral balance in INR in native decimals, in this case 1e8.
uint256 Collateral balance in ETH in native decimals, in this case 1e18.
vault Struct indicating user's vault details.

params.amount: Amount of Indai to be minted, in no decimals, example 50, should be less than CIP cross.

returns._0: max Max amount of Indai that can be minted.

performUpkeep(bytes).details: In this case, it is scanning all the vaults in database and updating vault health for them.Needed because we cannot tranditionally loop over all the vaults to update vault health.

scanVaults().details: Needed because we cannot tranditionally loop over all the vaults to update vault health due to gas costs.Called by chainlink automation or can be called by moderators or good keepers of this protocol.

params.amount: Amount of ETH to withdraw from vault.

burnIndaiAndRelieveCollateral(uint256).notice: Burn Indai and relieve collateral in ETH from the vault.Public function.User must have a vault first.

checkUpkeep(bytes).notice: Chainlink automation function to check if the conditions are met to perform upkeep.Public function.

createOrUpdateVault().notice: Create a new vault or add funds in an existing vault.Public function.User needs to send a msg.value with the functions, in ETH currently.

getVaultDetailsForTheUser().notice: Public getter function.User must have a vault first.

getVaultHealth(address).notice: Calculates the vault health of an address based on current collateral and indai issued.Moderator only getter function.

liquidateVault(address).notice: Liquidates vaults that get too risky.

mintIndai(uint256).notice: Mint indai based on collateral provided.Public function.User needs to have a vault first.One indai is issued for every ruppee of collateral(in ETH, converted to INR).User cannot mint if vault health is lower than 150 percent of CIP.

performUpkeep(bytes).notice: Chainlink automation function to perform upkeep.Public function.

scanVaults().notice: Scans all the vaults in database and updates vault health for them.Public function.

userIndexes(address).notice: Mapping of user's address to their vault index.

withdrawFromVault(uint256).notice: User can withdraw if any excess collateral than 150 percent of indai issued.Public function.
